DataElement.preferredName: Quality of Life Baseline Survey Administration Method Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the method used for the quality of life baseline survey.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Quality of Life Baseline Survey Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._A starting point to which things may be compared._The act of presenting a survey, questionnaire, or similar item to a person to obtain their responses.

For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
